name: The Wizzard's Cross
description:
Destroy the Evil Wizard Garglethorpe in this fast-paced action shooter. 

Features:
Blast magic at the monster's thrown at you
Discover new magical powers to use on your journey
Defeat 2 mini bosses to reach the evil Garglethorpe
Test your reflexes with simple one-touch controls + tilt based movement

Credits:
Rachel Tsou 
Adam Letherbarrow
Hayden Goldrick
Andrew Bryant
Conor McIntosh
